name: Menace/ Greylines "Poetry For The Damned" Split 7"
description:
***NOTE: This is a pre-order.***

Rarest color will be given on a first come first serve basis. This release is slated for late October early November. All orders will include a digital download.

Shipping Info:

*All orders will be sent by USPS Media Mail. Each order will be sent in a record mailer with cardboard padding, and bubble warp.

*If you would like a different shipping method, message me prior to ordering as the shipping cost will vary.

*If you would like to order more than 4 records please message me first, as the shipping cost will vary.

*International orders please message me first, as the shipping costs will vary.

Run of 500: 
25 Purple Swirl Hand Numbered Copies (Exclusively at the record release show) 
75 Purple Swirl 
100 Green Swirl 
300 Black
